author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH ISSUED FOR A PORTION OF THE COAST OF  BELIZE...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM WATCH ISSUED FOR A PORTION OF THE COAST OF  BELIZE...
 As of 6:15 AM CST Fri Nov 15
 the center of Sara was located near 16.1, -85.5
 with movement W at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 998 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
